tool_description: Enter the comma separated values in the box along with deviation type sample, population to find standard deviation using standard deviation calculator.
name: Standard Deviation
title: Standard Deviation

api_list.name: Get Standard Deviation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://standard-deviation1.p.rapidapi.com/standard-deviation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "standard-deviation1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://standard-deviation1.p.rapidapi.com/standard-deviation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "standard-deviation1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
